column6: The line has been drawn and the first strike has been made! Never has an X-Man had so much taken away and feared so much for what the future may bring! No more waiting for the next shoe to drop. The X-Men will take the fight to their enemies, no matter the cost!
column8: | letterer:Joe Caramagna | writer:Chris Claremont | colorist:Brian Haberlin | inker:Jonathan Sibal | penciller (cover):Billy Tan
